_comment: Created by ianb on 01/10/2014 11:57:24 using v2.1
title: How has the number of community nurses changed?
analysis_commentary: The number of community nurses fell from 48,018 in September 2009 to 45,272 in August 2013, a 5.7% decrease. Since then there has been a partial recovery, with 46,346 community nurses employed in May 2014. The number of community nurses is still 3.48% less than five years ago.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, NHS Hospital & Community Health Service Workforce Statistics
